SEARCH
Module gamecritic
Package gui_interfaces

Interface FieldInterface

All Superinterfaces:
StyleInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
LoginController, ProfileController, RegisterController
public interface FieldInterface extends StyleInterface
Interface that extends StyleInterface by inheriting its constants, and defines methods to set the styles of field elements depending on the state of data validation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface gui_interfaces.StyleInterface

    BoxBackgroundColor, errorFieldStyle, FieldBorderColor, GreenColor, initialScoreStyle, normalFieldStyle, RedColor, YellowColor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setPasswordErrorStyle()
    Sets style of the password field to indicate an error after failing validation.
    void
    setPasswordNormalStyle()
    Restores password field to its normal style after correcting a previous error or initially.
    void
    setUsernameErrorStyle()
    Sets style of the username field to indicate an error after failing validation.
    void
    setUsernameNormalStyle()
    Restores username field to its normal style after correcting a previous error or initially.

    Methods inherited from interface gui_interfaces.StyleInterface

    getScoreColor
